feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: Ghulam Mujtaba is a distinguished researcher in the field of Computer Vision and Deep Learning, currently working as a Postdoctoral Researcher at West Virginia University. He earned his Ph.D. in Computer Engineering from Gachon University and gained extensive research expertise at Sungkyunkwan University, specializing in computer vision and deep learning techniques. With a strong foundation in Computer Science, he excels in visual analysis, multimedia retrieval, and image processing, contributing significantly to both academic and industrial advancements in these fields.
